alert.note: Alert for Bastrop; Travis (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 16 at 9:22PM CDT until March 16 at 10:15PM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1015 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN TRAVIS AND CENTRAL BASTROP COUNTIES... At 921 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Manor, or 8 miles northeast of Austin Bergstrom Int Airport, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Austin, Pflugerville, Elgin, Bastrop, Austin Bergstrom Int Airport, Manor, West Lake Hills, Rollingwood, Camp Swift, Wyldwood, Cedar Creek, Circle D-KC Estates, Hornsby Bend, Sunset Valley, Webberville, Phelan, Garfield, McDade, Del Valle and Cedar Hills. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
